title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
Are you planning a trip to Italy, Uruguay, or Chile? Make sure you have the right power adapter to keep all your devices charged and ready to go! Introducing the [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR. This adapter is a must-have for travelers from the USA, as it easily converts your American outlets to fit the Italian, Uruguayan, or Chilean Type L outlets.

With 3 prong grounded plugs, 2 USB ports, and 2 American outlets, this 4 in 1 adapter is perfect for charging your cell phone, tablet, power bank, and other electronic devices. The dual USB ports deliver up to 2.4A of power, ensuring fast and efficient charging on the go.

Not only is this adapter compact and lightweight, but it is also CE and FCC certified, guaranteeing safety and quality. Plus, with a 12-month warranty and friendly customer service, you can trust that you're getting a reliable product.

Don't risk running out of battery while traveling abroad. Get your hands on the [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR today and stay connected wherever you go!

Are you planning a trip to Italy, Chile, Uruguay, or any other Type L socket country? Look no further than the [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR! This adapter is a must-have for travelers with its 3 prong grounded plug, 2 USB ports, and 2 American outlets, all packed into a compact and lightweight design. 

With a max capacity of 2500 watts (250 volts, 10 amps) and dual USB ports outputting up to 2.4A, this adapter is ideal for charging your cell phone, tablet, power bank, and other electronic devices. It's CE and FCC certified for quality assurance and comes with a 12-month warranty for peace of mind.

Don't worry about compatibility - this adapter works with standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plugs and is suitable for a wide range of devices. And with its friendly customer service and easy-to-use design, you'll have a stress-free travel experience. Get your [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter today and stay powered up on your next adventure!

With a max capacity of 2500 watts and voltage compatibility from 100V to 250V, this adapter is perfect for charging your cell phone, tablet, power bank, and other electronic devices. The dual USB ports can deliver up to 2.4A of power, ensuring fast and efficient charging.
